description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Hordes of delicious but diabolical coconut and chocolate covered treats are trying to take over the world. Day zero of the lamington invasion has begun, and it's up to you to stop them!
